title: Posting on the boards
body:
How come it say I need to be level 6 or more on most boards to post, when Im level 30?

Im not sure how it makes sense...

replies.body:
Have you tried to clear the cache on your browser, or perhaps use another browser? Have you tried logging in and out of the site, or maybe resetting your computer? 

Otherwise, it might just be a glitch on Riot's end. If it persists for a while, send in a ticket so they know about it: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Sometimes your Summoner and Boards profiles will fall out of sync if you haven't used the boards in quite a while. A post like this, in Help & Support specifically (since we have no level requirement for posting) usually resolves this issue, which it looks like it did! Happy posting~!
